div.h2: CARIN RTPBC Example Reject Code System

div.p: This code system contains example NCPDP Reject Codes (511-FB codes set) to be used by real-time pharmacy benefit check servers when encountering a data or business rule error that prevents processing from completing. This is a placeholder to be replaced prior to publishing with a formal mechanism for referencing in FHIR.
This code system http://ncpdp.org/reject-code defines the following codes:

tr.td: Cardholder ID Matched But Last Name Did Not
Cardholder ID Matched But Last Name Did Not
Coverage Outside Submitted Date Of Transaction
Coverage Outside Submitted Date Of Transaction
